languages.text: {n}Арджента не успевает договорить — рухнувший на колени культист прерывает ее грубым хриплым смехом.{/n} "Конечно, они знакомы тебе. Я тоже узнал тебя, маленькая служка мертвеца на троне. Разве ты не ощутила уже на себе мощь истинного бога? Разве не бежала от нас, роняя слезы?"

{n}Argenta doesn't get to finish — the cultist, having dropped to his knees, interrupts her with grating, rasping laughter.{/n} "Of course you know them. I recognise you too, lackey to the corpse on the throne. Haven't you already experienced the power of the true god? Didn't you flee from us, shedding tears?"
languages.original_text: {n}Арджента не успевает договорить — рухнувший на колени культист прерывает ее грубым хриплым смехом.{/n} "Конечно, они знакомы тебе. Я тоже узнал тебя, маленькая служка мертвеца на троне. Разве ты не ощутила уже на себе мощь истинного бога? Разве не бежала от нас, роняя слезы?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta doesn't get to finish — the cultist, having dropped to his knees, interrupts her with grating, rasping laughter.{/n} "Of course you know them. I recognize you too, the dead man's little lackey. Haven't you already experienced the power of the true god? Didn't you flee from us, shedding tears?"
traits.speaker: CultistLeaderSororitasQuest

I recognise you too, lackey to the corpse on the throne. Haven't you already experienced the power of the true god? Didn't you flee from us, shedding tears?"

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔还没能把话说完，那个邪教徒就跪在了地上，用刺耳的笑声打断了她。{/n}“你当然听过我们的祷词了，我也认出你是谁了。王座上那具尸体的走狗啊，你不是已经体会过真神的力量了吗？你不是一边抹着眼泪，一边从我们面前逃走了吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta doesn't get to finish — the cultist, having dropped to his knees, interrupts her with grating, rasping laughter.{/n} "Of course you know them. I recognise you too, lackey to the corpse on the throne. Haven't you already experienced the power of the true god? Didn't you flee from us, shedding tears?"

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔还没能把话说完，那个邪教徒就跪在了地上，用刺耳的笑声打断了她。{/n}“你当然听过我们的祷词了，我也认出你是谁了。王座上那具尸体的走狗啊，你不是已经体会过真神的力量了吗？你不是一边抹着眼泪，一边从我们面前逃走了吗？”
traits.speaker: CultistLeaderSororitasQuest

languages.text: {n}Argenta no llega a terminar. El sectario, cayendo de rodillas, la interrumpe con una risa áspera y jadeante.{/n} «Claro que las conoces. Igual que yo te conozco a ti, lacaya del cadáver del trono. ¿Acaso no has experimentado ya el poder del dios verdadero? ¿Acaso no huiste sollozando de nosotros?».
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta doesn't get to finish — the cultist, having dropped to his knees, interrupts her with grating, rasping laughter.{/n} "Of course you know them. I recognise you too, lackey to the corpse on the throne. Haven't you already experienced the power of the true god? Didn't you flee from us, shedding tears?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta no llega a terminar. El sectario, cayendo de rodillas, la interrumpe con una risa áspera y jadeante.{/n} «Claro que las conoces. Igual que yo te conozco a ti, lacaya del cadáver del trono. ¿Acaso no has experimentado ya el poder del dios verdadero? ¿Acaso no huiste sollozando de nosotros?».
traits.speaker: CultistLeaderSororitasQuest

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタは最後まで言い切ることはできなかった…教団信者は膝をつき、耳障りな、荒い笑い声で彼女を遮る。{/n}「もちろん、お前は知っているだろうとも。私もお前を知っているぞ、王座に座る死体の下僕よ。真なる神の力を経験したことがないのか？お前は涙を流しながら、我々から逃げただろう？」
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta doesn't get to finish — the cultist, having dropped to his knees, interrupts her with grating, rasping laughter.{/n} "Of course you know them. I recognise you too, lackey to the corpse on the throne. Haven't you already experienced the power of the true god? Didn't you flee from us, shedding tears?"

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタは最後まで言い切ることはできなかった…教団信者は膝をつき、耳障りな、荒い笑い声で彼女を遮る。{/n}「もちろん、お前は知っているだろうとも。私もお前を知っているぞ、王座に座る死体の下僕よ。真なる神の力を経験したことがないのか？お前は涙を流しながら、我々から逃げただろう？」
traits.speaker: CultistLeaderSororitasQuest

languages.text: {n}Argenta kann den Satz nicht zu Ende bringen – der Kultist, mittlerweile auf den Knien, unterbricht sie mit einen unangenehmen, rauen Lachen.{/n} "Natürlich kennt Ihr sie. Ich erkenne Euch auch, Lakaiin des Leichnams auf dem Thron. Habt Ihr nicht bereits die Macht des wahren Gottes erlebt? Seid Ihr nicht heulend vor uns geflohen?"
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta doesn't get to finish — the cultist, having dropped to his knees, interrupts her with grating, rasping laughter.{/n} "Of course you know them. I recognise you too, lackey to the corpse on the throne. Haven't you already experienced the power of the true god? Didn't you flee from us, shedding tears?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta kann den Satz nicht zu Ende bringen – der Kultist, mittlerweile auf den Knien, unterbricht sie mit einen unangenehmen, rauen Lachen.{/n} "Natürlich kennt Ihr sie. Ich erkenne Euch auch, Lakaiin des Leichnams auf dem Thron. Habt Ihr nicht bereits die Macht des wahren Gottes erlebt? Seid Ihr nicht heulend vor uns geflohen?"
traits.speaker: CultistLeaderSororitasQuest

languages.text: {n}Le rire grinçant du cultiste, qui est tombé à genoux, lui coupe la parole.{/n} « Bien sûr que vous l'avez entendue. Je vous reconnais, servante du cadavre pourrissant sur le trône. Auriez-vous oublié que vous avez déjà connu la puissance du dieu véritable ? Que vous avez pris la fuite face à nous, en pleurant toutes les larmes de votre corps ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta doesn't get to finish — the cultist, having dropped to his knees, interrupts her with grating, rasping laughter.{/n} "Of course you know them. I recognise you too, lackey to the corpse on the throne. Haven't you already experienced the power of the true god? Didn't you flee from us, shedding tears?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le rire grinçant du cultiste, qui est tombé à genoux, lui coupe la parole.{/n} « Bien sûr que vous l'avez entendue. Je vous reconnais, servante du cadavre pourrissant sur le trône. Auriez-vous oublié que vous avez déjà connu la puissance du dieu véritable ? Que vous avez pris la fuite face à nous, en pleurant toutes les larmes de votre corps ? »
traits.speaker: CultistLeaderSororitasQuest

languages.text: {n}Argenta'nın lafı yarıda kesiliyor. Diz üstü çöken tarikatçı, nahoş olduğu kadar hırıltıyı andıran bir kahkaha patlatıyor.{/n} "Aşinasın tabii ki! Ben de sana aşinayım. Tahtı işgal eden kadavranın sadık köpeği... Gerçek tanrının gücüne tanık olmadın mı? Ağlayarak kuyruğunu kıstırıp kaçmadın mı?"
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta doesn't get to finish — the cultist, having dropped to his knees, interrupts her with grating, rasping laughter.{/n} "Of course you know them. I recognise you too, lackey to the corpse on the throne. Haven't you already experienced the power of the true god? Didn't you flee from us, shedding tears?"

Tahtı işgal eden kadavranın sadık köpeği… Gerçek tanrının gücüne tanık olmadın mı? Ağlayarak kuyruğunu kıstırıp kaçmadın mı?"
